title: sharaNu ninage
sahitya:
sharaNu sakalOddhAra asura kula samhAra sharaNu dasharatha bAlA jAnakIlOla


caraNam 1    I mudu I mukhavu I tanuvina kAnti I billu I bANa I nIti I bhAva
I tamma I sIte I paNDa I bhAgya yAva dEvarige uNTU mUrulOkadoLage
    caraNam 2    uTTa pItAmbara uDigajje mANikkavu doDDa navaratnada AbharaNa iralu 
koTTa nambi tanna bhaktaragellA shrSTiyoLage kANe kausalya rAma
    caraNam 3    pLisanu ayOdhya paTTaNada puravAsa bEDida iSTArttagaLa koDuviniyanuta 
nODi bhaktarigellA bEDa vara koDuva svAmi purandara viTTalarAyanna
